short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Encoding and escaping at the speed of copypasta

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Macaroni helps you quickly copy text you select as one of the following encodings:
- base64
- URL encoding
- HTML entity encoding
- JSON escaping

The extension is open source - https://github.com/0xedward/macaroni
